tgt_original: 是女人從坐起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，合掌白佛言： 「世尊！

src_original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot /  tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata /  samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat  atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan //
tgt_original: 爾時，世尊知是女人深心因緣，即時微笑。 如諸佛法種種色光從口中出，青、黃、赤、白、紅、縹，遍照十方無量無邊佛國，還遶佛三匝，從頂上入。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ  pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
tgt_original: 爾時，阿難從座起，右膝著地，合掌白佛：

src_original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, (Vaidya 181)  kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya?
tgt_original: 「佛何因緣微笑？

src_original: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /

src_original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate  'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
tgt_original: 」佛告阿難： 「是恒伽提婆姊未來世中當作佛，劫名星宿，佛號金花。

src_original: tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /  seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā  akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
tgt_original: 是女人畢女身，受男子形，當生阿閦佛阿毘羅提國土，於彼淨修梵行。 阿難！ 是菩薩在彼國土，亦號金花。

src_original: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati /  tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena /  tato 'pi buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetrāṇi saṃkramiṣyati /  yānyavirahitāni bhaviṣyanti buddhairbhagavadbhistatra tatra saṃkramiṣyati /
tgt_original: 是金華菩薩於彼壽終，復至他方佛國； 從一佛國至一佛國，不離諸佛。

src_original: sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇītalaṃ nākrāmet,  sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
tgt_original: 譬如轉輪聖王，從一觀至一觀，從生至終，足不蹈地。

src_original: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati /  tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddhairbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
tgt_original: 阿難！ 是金花菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，從一佛國至一佛國，乃至阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，未甞不見佛。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,  tathāgatasaṃnipāta eva sa veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 」時，阿難作是念言： 「是金華菩薩摩訶薩後作佛時，諸菩薩摩訶薩會，當知為如佛會。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda, evam etat
tgt_original: 」佛知阿難意所念，告阿難言： 「如是！ 如是！

src_original: bodhipariniṣpatyupagatāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 阿難！

src_original: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /  api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
tgt_original: 是金花佛比丘僧無量無邊、不可數不可數，若干百千萬億那由他。

src_original: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ
tgt_original: 」阿難白佛言： 「世尊！ 是女人從何處殖德本、種善根？

src_original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya (Vaidya 182)  tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitam,  anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 」佛告阿難： 「是女人從然燈佛所種善根，初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，以是功德，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat - gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ tathāgatena bhāṣitam /  yannvahaṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyametatsthānam /
